ClassDesc: Represents an operation upon two operands of the same type, producing a result of the same type as the operands. This is a specialization of @B_java#util#function#BiFunction_E@ for the case where the operands and the result are all of the same type. This is a @B_java#util#function#BiFunction#apply_E@.
